tool_description: API contains countries state and cities data.
name: Country State
title: Country State

api_list.name: Get Single City
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/cities/108"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/cities/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Cities By State Id
api_list.description: Return all cities of given state
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/states/3871/cities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get States By CountryId
api_list.description: Return all states of given country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://country-state.p.rapidapi.com/api/countries/1/states"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "country-state.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
